tika-s0519t0:4_5: taṁ sammadeva tesaṁ uggahaṇadhāraṇādikkamaladdhabbāya sammāpaṭipattiyā sabbahitasukhanipphādanatthaṁ.
tika-s0519t0:4_9: āyatiṁ paresaṁ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanato ca saṁvaṇṇanāyaṁ ratanattayapaṇāmakiriyā.
tika-s0519t0:4_17: Vatthuttayapūjā hi niratisayapuññakkhettasambuddhiyā aparimeyyappabhāvo puññātisayoti bahuvidhantarāyepi
tika-s0519t0:5_0: ‘‘Pūjārahe pūjayato, buddhe yadi va sāvake’’ti. (dha. pa. 195; apa. thera 1.10.1) ca,
tika-s0519t0:7_4: agge kho pana pasannānaṁ aggo vipāko hotī’’ti (a. ni. 4.34; itivu. 90) ca,
tika-s0519t0:10_0: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenapi jambudīpassa;
tika-s0519t0:11_2: dīpassā’’ti. (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.6; itivu. aṭṭha 90; dī. ni. ṭī.
tika-s0519t0:11_3: 1.ganthārambhakathāvaṇṇanā; ma. ni. ṭī. 1.1; a. ni. ṭī.
tika-s0519t0:13_2: nevassa tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti,
tika-s0519t0:16_0: Bhayaṁ vā chambhitattaṁ vā, lomahaṁso na hessatī’’ti. (saṁ. ni. 1.249) ca;
tika-s0519t0:17_3: vandanārahe ca katā vandanā yathādhippetappayojanaṁ sādhetīti.
tika-s0519t0:17_7: Tathā hi suttantadesanā na vinayadesanā viya karuṇāppadhānā,
tika-s0519t0:17_9: atha kho karuṇāpaññāppadhānāti tadubhayappadhānadesanāvisesavibhāvanaṁ tāva sammāsambuddhassa thomanaṁ
tika-s0519t0:18_1: 1.ganthārambhakathāvaṇṇanā; ma. ni. ṭī. 1.1; saṁ. ni. ṭī. 1.1.1; a. ni. ṭī.
tika-s0519t0:18_5: paradukkhe sati kāruṇikaṁ hiṁsati vibādhatīti attho .
tika-s0519t0:18_7: paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṁ hadayakhedaṁ karotīti attho.
tika-s0519t0:18_11: attasukhanirapekkhatāya kāruṇikānaṁ sukhaṁ rundhati vibandhatīti attho.
tika-s0519t0:18_14: Yathā hi dvāraṭṭhānato aññattha vattamānopi dvārapaṭibaddhajīviko puriso dvārānativattavuttitāya dvāre niyuttoti ‘‘dovāriko’’ti vuccati,
tika-s0519t0:18_15: evaṁ bhagavā mettādivasena karuṇāvihārato aññattha vattamānopi karuṇānativattavuttitāya karuṇāya niyuttoti ‘‘kāruṇiko’’ti vuccati.
tika-s0519t0:18_16: Mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya hi yāva mahāparinibbānā lokahitatthameva lokanāthā tiṭṭhantīti.
tika-s0519t0:18_18: Satipi bhagavato tadaññaguṇānampi vasena mahantabhāve kāruṇikasaddasannidhānena vuttattā karuṇāvasenevettha
tika-s0519t0:18_20: Evañca katvā ‘‘mahākāruṇiko’’ti iminā padena puggalādhiṭṭhānena satthu mahākaruṇā vuttā hoti.
tika-s0519t0:19_1: atthasādhanato karuṇaṁ karuṇāyanaṁ karuṇāsampavattanaṁ arahatīti kāruṇiko.
tika-s0519t0:19_2: Bhagavato hi sabbaññutāya anavasesato sattānaṁ hitaṁ,
tika-s0519t0:19_6: Atha vā karuṇā karuṇāyanaṁ sīlaṁ pakati sabhāvo etassāti kāruṇiko.
tika-s0519t0:19_7: Bhagavā hi pathavīphassādayo viya kakkhaḷaphusanādisabhāvā karuṇāsabhāvo sabhāvabhūtakaruṇoti attho.
tika-s0519t0:19_12: Bhagavato hi karuṇā niravasesesu sattesu pavattati,
tika-s0519t0:19_14: diṭṭhadhammikādibhedañca mahantameva sattānaṁ hitasukhaṁ ekantato nipphādeti,
tika-s0519t0:20_4: Atha vā nāthati veneyyagataṁ kilesabyasanaṁ upatāpetīti nātho,
tika-s0519t0:20_9: bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ attasampattiṁ paccavekkhitā’’tiādinā (a. ni. 8.7,
tika-s0519t0:20_10: 8) sattānaṁ taṁ taṁ hitappaṭipattiṁ yācitvāpi mahākaruṇāya samussāhito te tattha niyojeti.
tika-s0519t0:20_12: sabbasatte vā sīlādiguṇehi īsati abhibhavatīti paramissaro bhagavā ‘‘nātho’’ti vuccati,
tika-s0519t0:21_4: patitapatitānaṁ attano puthulagambhīrabhāvehi saṁsīdanaṁ nimmujjanaṁ karotīti attho.
tika-s0519t0:21_10: imaṁ velaṁ nātikkamāmī’’ti lokena saṅgaraṁ saṅketaṁ karonto viya hotīti attho.
tika-s0519t0:21_11: Saṅgaraṇaṁ vā samantato galanaṁ sandanaṁ udakena karotīti sāgaro.
tika-s0519t0:21_12: Kappavuṭṭhānakāle hi mahāsamuddo ito cito ca paggharitvā sakalaṁ lokadhātuṁ ekoghaṁ karotīti.
tika-s0519t0:21_13: Lokiyā pana vadanti ‘‘sāgarassa rañño puttehi sāgarehi nibbattito khatoti sāgaro,
tika-s0519t0:21_15: taṁsambandhatāya ruḷhivasena sabbopi samuddo tathā voharīyatī’’ti.
tika-s0519t0:21_20: Tathā hi ñeyyasseva sātisayā puthulatā aparimāṇalokadhātubyāpanato,
tika-s0519t0:21_24: na itarassa paricchinnadesattā bāhirakavītarāgehipi ittarena khaṇena atikkamitabbattā,
tika-s0519t0:22_4: Tattha ‘‘kicchaṁ vatāyaṁ loko āpanno’’tiādinā (dī. ni. 2.57; saṁ. ni. 2.4, 10; peṭako.
tika-s0519t0:22_5: 23) karuṇāyanavaseneva abhinivisitvā anekākāravokāre saṅkhāre sammasantaṁ bhagavato sammasanañāṇaṁ chattiṁsakoṭisatasahassamukhena
tika-s0519t0:22_6: ñeyyasāgaraṁ ajjhogāhetvā tassa pāraṁ pariyantaṁ agamāsi,
tika-s0519t0:23_4: ekattādibhedato nandiyāvaṭṭādivibhāgato ca vicitrā visiṭṭhā nānāvidhā nayā etissāti nipuṇagambhīravicitranayā,
tika-s0519t0:24_4: savāsanānaṁ sabbesaṁ kilesānaṁ accantappahānato ca veditabbā,
tika-s0519t0:24_10: yathāvuttabhedā duvidhā ca attahitasampatti pakāsitā hoti. Kathaṁ?
tika-s0519t0:24_14: ‘‘nātha’’nti iminā pana ubhayathāpi bhagavato parahitappaṭipatti pakāsitā karuṇākiccadīpanato,
tika-s0519t0:25_0: Atha vā tīhākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā hetuto, phalato,
tika-s0519t0:25_4: Phalaṁ catubbidhaṁ ñāṇasampadā pahānasampadā ānubhāvasampadā rūpakāyasampadā cāti.
tika-s0519t0:25_5: Tāsu padhānabhūtā ñāṇapahānasampadā ‘‘ñeyyasāgarapāragu’’nti iminā padena pakāsitā.
tika-s0519t0:25_6: Padhāne hi dassite avinābhāvato itarampi dvayaṁ dassitameva hoti.
tika-s0519t0:25_7: Na hi buddhānaṁ ānubhāvarūpakāyasampattīhi vinā kadācipi dhammakāyasirī vattatīti.
tika-s0519t0:25_8: Upakāro anantaraṁ abāhiraṁ katvā tividhayānamukhena vimuttidhammadesanā,
tika-s0519t0:26_2: Mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso hi bhagavā saṁsārapaṅkato sattānaṁ samuddharaṇatthaṁ katābhinīhāro anupubbena
tika-s0519t0:26_3: pāramiyo pūretvā anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ adhigatoti karuṇā sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṁ.
tika-s0519t0:26_7: Vuttappabhedaṁ pana sammasanañāṇaṁ saha paññāpāramiyā tassā pubbabhāgapaṭipadā.
tika-s0519t0:26_11: Tathā hi sabbānatthaparihārapubbaṅgamāya niravasesahitasukhavidhānatapparāya niratisayāya payogasampattiyā,
tika-s0519t0:26_13: bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṁ sattānaṁ anuttaragāravaṭṭhānabhūtatāya ca ‘‘nātho’’ti vuccatīti.
tika-s0519t0:26_19: itarehi attahitasampattīti tadubhayena attahitāya paṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu bhagavato catutthapuggalabhāvaṁ dīpeti,
tika-s0519t0:27_0: Ettha ca yathā ‘‘mahākāruṇika’’nti iminā padena bhagavato mahākaruṇā dassitā,
tika-s0519t0:27_2: Tesu karuṇāggahaṇena lokiyesu mahaggatabhāvappattāsādhāraṇaguṇadīpanato bhagavato sabbalokiyaguṇasampatti dassitā hoti,
tika-s0519t0:27_7: Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena lokasamaññānurūpaṁ bhagavato pavattiṁ dasseti lokavohāravisayattā karuṇāya,
tika-s0519t0:27_9: Sabhāvānavabodhena hi dhammānaṁ samaññaṁ atidhāvitvā sattādisammasanaṁ hotīti.
tika-s0519t0:27_23: mogharājamāṇavapucchāniddesa 85; paṭi. ma. 3.5; dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.305; vibha. mūlaṭī.
tika-s0519t0:27_26: 2.34) evamādīnaṁ anekesaṁ paññāppabhedānaṁ vasena ñāṇacāraṁ dasseti.
tika-s0519t0:28_18: iti ādipariyosānadassanena sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti.
tika-s0519t0:28_19: Tathā karuṇāvacanena sīlakkhandhapubbaṅgamo samādhikkhandho dassito hoti.
tika-s0519t0:28_25: paññā pariyosānanti evampi ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti nayato dassitattā.
tika-s0519t0:28_26: Eso eva hi niravasesato buddhaguṇānaṁ dassanupāyo,
tika-s0519t0:28_28: aññathā ko nāma samattho bhagavato guṇe anupadaṁ niravasesato dassetuṁ.
tika-s0519t0:29_0: ‘‘Buddhopi buddhassa bhaṇeyya vaṇṇaṁ, kappampi ce aññamabhāsamāno;
tika-s0519t0:30_1: vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassā’’ti. (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.304; 3.141; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 3.425; udā. aṭṭha. 53; apa. aṭṭha. 2.7.20; bu. vaṁ. aṭṭha. 4.4; cariyā. aṭṭha.
tika-s0519t0:30_4: 1.ganthārambhakathāvaṇṇanā; ma. ni. ṭī. 1.1; saṁ. ni. ṭī. 1.1.1; a. ni. ṭī. 1.1.1; vajira. ṭī.
tika-s0519t0:31_0: Teneva ca āyasmatā sāriputtattherenāpi buddhaguṇaparicchedanaṁ pati anuyuttena ‘‘no hetaṁ,
tika-s0519t0:32_0: Evaṁ saṅkhepena sakalasabbaññuguṇehi bhagavantaṁ abhitthavitvā idāni saddhammaṁ thometuṁ ‘‘vijjācaraṇasampannā’’tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t0:32_5: catunnaṁ vā ariyasaccānaṁ viditakaraṇaṭṭhena vijjāti evaṁ tāvettha vacanatthato vijjā veditabbā.
tika-s0519t0:32_6: Pabhedato pana tissopi vijjā vijjā bhayabheravasutte āgataniyāmeneva,
tika-s0519t0:32_12: imehi ca caraṇehi sampannā sampannāgatāti vijjācaraṇasampannā.
tika-s0519t0:33_7: ‘‘Tāya saddhāya avūpasantāyā’’ti vacanato maggena samucchinnānaṁ kilesānaṁ paṭippassaddhippahānakiccatāya phalassa niyyānānuguṇatā,
tika-s0519t0:33_8: niyyānapariyosānatā cāti iminā pariyāyena siyā karaṇattho niyyānakiriyāya.
tika-s0519t0:33_12: 886 ādayo) saraṇīyabhāvena gahitāti tesaṁ magganibbānānaṁ viya mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṁ saraṇabhāvo uddhaṭo.
tika-s0519t0:33_13: Visesato cettha maggapariyāpannā eva vijjācaraṇadhammā veditabbā.
tika-s0519t0:33_14: Te hi nippariyāyena niyyānakiriyāya sādhakatamabhūtā, na itare.
tika-s0519t0:33_18: Nāyaṁ virodho samānakālatāya eva adhippetattā yathā ‘‘cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa’’nti (ma. ni. 1.204, 400; 3.421, 425, 426; saṁ. ni. 2.43-45; 4.60; kathā. 465, 467).
tika-s0519t0:33_19: Sampannāti vā padassa vattamānakālatthatā veditabbā ‘‘uppannā dhammā’’ti (dha. sa.
tika-s0519t0:33_21: Evañca katvā vacanasesamantareneva padayojanā siddhā hoti.
tika-s0519t0:33_22: ‘‘Yenā’’ti ca padaṁ ubhayattha sambandhitabbaṁ ‘‘yena dhammena vijjācaraṇasampannā,
tika-s0519t0:34_4: Tathā hesa attanā uttaritarassa abhāvena ‘‘anuttaro’’ti vuccati.
tika-s0519t0:34_11: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṁ aggamakkhāyatī’’ti (itivu. 90; a. ni.
tika-s0519t0:35_1: saṁsārato ca apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo. Sammā,
tika-s0519t0:35_4: tena yathā sammāsambodhisamadhigameneva sabbe buddhaguṇā sampāpuṇīyanti,
tika-s0519t0:35_5: evaṁ sammadeva āsevanāya bhāvanāya bahulīkiriyāya sammāpaṭipattiyā sammadeva paccavekkhaṇāya sakkaccaṁ
tika-s0519t0:36_3: Maggānaṭṭhaṅgiko seṭṭho (dha. pa. 273; netti. 170; peṭako. 30). Yāvatā,
tika-s0519t0:36_9: maggo sattānaṁ visuddhiyā (dī. ni. 2.373; ma. ni. 1.106; saṁ. ni. 5.367, 384). Dhammaṁ,
tika-s0519t0:37_1: abhitthavanena ca pūjito mānito apacitoti sammāsambuddhapūjito,
tika-s0519t0:38_1: yassa dhammassa adhigamane vijjāsampannā ceva honti caraṇasampannā ca,
tika-s0519t0:38_4: anavasesadukkhanissaraṇahetubhūtañca uttamaṁ pavaraṁ saddhiṁ pariyattidhammena navavidhaṁ lokuttaradhammaṁ
tika-s0519t0:39_1: vijjācaraṇasampannā ca hontī’’ti padadvayena yathākkamaṁ dhammassa bhāvetabbabhāvo,
tika-s0519t0:39_23: Atha vā paṭhamena niyyānikabhāvadassanato svākkhātatāya dhammaṁ thometi,
tika-s0519t0:40_0: ‘‘Uttama’’nti ca etena aññassa visiṭṭhassa abhāvadīpanena paripuṇṇatāya dhammaṁ thometi ,
tika-s0519t0:40_8: Tathā bhāvetabbabhāvenassa saha pubbabhāgasīlādīhi sekkhā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā,
tika-s0519t0:40_9: sacchikātabbabhāvena saha asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā asekkhā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā dassitā hontīti.
tika-s0519t0:41_0: Evaṁ saṅkhepena sabbasaddhammaguṇehi saddhammaṁ thometvā idāni ariyasaṅghaṁ thometuṁ ‘‘sīlādiguṇasampanno’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-s0519t0:41_3: Ariyānañhi taṁtaṁmaggavajjhakilesappahānena hatapaṭipakkhā suvisuddhā sīlādayo ‘‘sampannā’’ti vattabbataṁ arahanti ,
tika-s0519t0:41_8: Ariyapuggalānañhi ariyasaccappaṭivedhena saheva yathārahaṁ sekkhāsekkhā sīlādidhammakkhandhā pāripūriṁ gacchantīti.
tika-s0519t0:42_0: Nanu ca ariyasaṅghe na sabbe ariyapuggalā maggaṭṭhā,
tika-s0519t0:42_3: avayavadhammena pana samudāyaṁ niddisanto evamāha yathā ‘‘samaṁ cuṇṇa’’nti.
tika-s0519t0:42_4: Yathā hi yogacuṇṇassa avayavesu labbhamāno samabhāvo samudāye apadisīyati ‘‘samaṁ cuṇṇa’’nti,
tika-s0519t0:42_5: evaṁ ariyasaṅghassa avayavabhūtesu ariyapuggalesu labbhamāno maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhabhāvo samudāyabhūte ariyasaṅghe
tika-s0519t0:43_5: ariyo ca so saṅgho cāti ariyasaṅgho,
tika-s0519t0:43_7: Pujjabhavaphalanibbattanato attano santānaṁ punātīti vā puññaṁ,
tika-s0519t0:43_8: khittaṁ vuttaṁ bījaṁ viruhanaṭṭhānatāya tāyati rakkhatīti khettaṁ kedārādi,
tika-s0519t0:43_10: sattānaṁ puññassa mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena viruhanaṭṭhānatāya khettanti puññakkhettaṁ.
tika-s0519t0:44_0: Ettha ca ‘‘sīlādiguṇasampanno’’ti etena ariyasaṅghassa bhagavato anujātaputtataṁ dasseti,
tika-s0519t0:44_7: ‘‘Puññakkhettaṁ anuttara’’nti etena lokassa bahūpakārataṁ dasseti aggadakkhiṇeyyabhāvadīpanato.
tika-s0519t0:45_6: ‘‘Sīlādiguṇasampanno’’ti iminā panassa vihatavidhastakilesā anavasesā sekkhāsekkhā sīlādidhammakkhandhā dassitā.
tika-s0519t0:45_7: ‘‘Ariyasaṅghaṁ puññakkhettaṁ anuttara’’nti iminā tesaṁ tesaññeva yathāvuttaguṇavisesānaṁ suparisuddhataṁ dīpeti.
tika-s0519t0:45_14: asekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo pariyosānanti ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā sabbe ariyasaṅghaguṇā imāya gāthāya pakāsitāti veditabbaṁ.
tika-s0519t0:46_0: Evaṁ gāthāttayena saṅkhepato sakalaguṇasaṁkittanamukhena ratanattayassa paṇāmaṁ katvā idāni taṁ nipaccakāraṁ
tika-s0519t0:48_1: ratanaṁ tena vuccatī’’ti. (khu. pā. aṭṭha. 6.3; dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.33; saṁ. ni. 5.223; su. ni. aṭṭha. 1.226; mahāni. aṭṭha. 50; dī. ni. ṭī.
tika-s0519t0:48_2: 1.ganthārambhakathā; ma. ni. ṭī. 1.4; saṁ. ni. ṭī. 1.1.4; a. ni. ṭī. 1.1.4; sārattha. ṭī.
tika-s0519t0:49_0: Cittīkatabhāvādayo ca anaññasādhāraṇā buddhādīsu eva labbhanti,
tika-s0519t0:49_5: ratanattayassa ca khettabhāvasampattiyā tassa puññassa atthasaṁvaṇṇanāya upaghātakaupaddavānaṁ vihanane samatthataṁ dasseti.
tika-s0519t0:49_6: Sabbatthāti sabbasmiṁ anto ceva bahi ca,
tika-s0519t0:49_12: Tassāti yaṁ ratanattaye vandanājanitaṁ puññaṁ, tassa.
tika-s0519t0:50_0: Evaṁ ratanattayavandanāya payojanaṁ dassetvā idāni nettippakaraṇassa gambhīratthattā atthasaṁvaṇṇanāya dukkarabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘ṭhiti’’ntiādimāha.
tika-s0519t0:50_3: ‘‘ahovatāyaṁ saddhammanetti ciraṁ tiṭṭheyyā’’ti evaṁ patthayantenāti vuttaṁ hoti.
tika-s0519t0:50_7: Saddhammo hi veneyyasantānesu ariyaguṇānaṁ nayanato netti,
tika-s0519t0:50_17: ‘‘karotu āyasmā nettippakaraṇassa kañci atthasaṁvaṇṇana’’nti evaṁ nettiyā atthasaṁvaṇṇanaṁ pati ajjhesitoti vuttaṁ hoti.
tika-s0519t0:50_18: Ettha ca saddhammassa ciraṁ ṭhitikāmena ajjhāsayasampannena sāsane thiraguṇayuttena sabrahmacārinā ādaragāravena,
tika-s0519t0:50_19: abhimukhaṁ vā yācitena me na sakkā tassa abhiyācanaṁ paṭikkhipitunti dasseti ‘‘ṭhitiṁ ākaṅkhamānenā’’ti gāthāya.
tika-s0519t0:51_2: samantacakkhunā eva vā hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalakaṁ viya abhinīhāraṁ passantena.
tika-s0519t0:52_2: mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ saṁkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajantānaṁ yadidaṁ mahākaccāno’’ti (a. ni. 1.188, 197) –
tika-s0519t0:53_1: Sīlādiguṇavisesehi mahantā sāvakāti mahāsāvakā (theragā. aṭṭha. 2.1288; a. ni. ṭī. 2.3.59),
tika-s0519t0:53_4: mahāsāvako ca so guṇavisesayogato uttamo cāti mahāsāvakuttamo.
tika-s0519t0:54_1: ariyiddhivasena paramassa ca cetovasībhāvassa adhigatattā vasippatto.
tika-s0519t0:54_9: 1.205) anekesu ṭhānesu bhagavatā pasaṁsitattā sambuddhena pasaṁsito.
tika-s0519t0:55_4: Ekasmiṁ kira samaye ayaṁ mahāthero jambuvanasaṇḍe viharanto attano santikāvacarānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ imaṁ hāranayapaṭimaṇḍitaṁ pakaraṇaṁ abhāsi.
tika-s0519t0:55_5: Bhāsitvā ca bhagavato santikaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisinno yathābhāsitaṁ imaṁ pakaraṇaṁ bhagavato nivedesi.
tika-s0519t0:55_8: imaṁ dhammasaṁvaṇṇanaṁ dhammanettitveva dhārehī’’ti nāmaggahaṇaṁ akāsīti vadanti.
tika-s0519t0:56_4: attano ca ñāṇassa nātivisayataṁ viditvā saṁvaṇṇanārambhe saṁsīdantampi maṁ sāsanaguṇādiupanissayasampadā
tika-s0519t0:57_0: ‘‘Pañcapinikāye ogāhetvā’’ti iminā nettiyā pañcapi mahānikāye anupavisitvā avaṭṭhānaṁ,
tika-s0519t0:57_3: 23) ānetvā idha desanāhārādīnaṁ padatthavinicchayo peṭakena saṁsandanaṁ nāma.
tika-s0519t0:57_4: ‘‘yathābala’’nti iminā sabbathā sabbabhāgenāpi nettiyā saṁvaṇṇanā mayā na sukarā kātuṁ,
tika-s0519t0:57_5: attano pana ñāṇabalānurūpaṁ karissāmīti niratimānataṁ dīpeti.
tika-s0519t0:58_2: Asaṁkiṇṇanti sanikāyepi padatthantaraparikappanādinā asaṁkiṇṇaṁ tādisasaṅkararahitaṁ anākulaṁ suparicchinnaṁ.
tika-s0519t0:58_6: nipuṇo sukhumo saṇho atthavinicchayo etassāti nipuṇatthavinicchayo.
tika-s0519t0:58_15: siddhantaṁ taṁ avilomento anukūlato tattha siddhaṁyeva dhammanettiṁ pakāsayanto nettippakaraṇassa atthasaṁvaṇṇanaṁ karissāmīti.
tika-s0519t0:59_0: Pamādalekhanti aparabhāge potthakāruḷhakāle pamajjitvā likhanavasena pavattappamādapāṭhaṁ.
tika-s0519t0:59_2: Pāḷiṁ sammā niyojayanti taṁ taṁ nettipāḷiṁ tattha tattha udāharaṇabhāvena ānītasutte sammadeva niyojento,
tika-s0519t0:59_3: atthasaṁvaṇṇanāya vā taṁ taṁ udāharaṇasuttasaṅkhātaṁ pāḷiṁ tasmiṁ tasmiṁ lakkhaṇabhūte nettiganthe sammadeva niyojento.
tika-s0519t0:59_5: Yvāyaṁ sapaṭṭhānavibhāgassa tettiṁsavidhassa nettipadatthassa saha nimittavibhāgena asaṅkarato vavatthito visayo, taṁ.
tika-s0519t0:60_0: Ettha ca ‘‘abhiyācito’’ti iminā atthasaṁvaṇṇanāya nimittaṁ dasseti,
tika-s0519t0:61_0: Idāni saṁvaṇṇanāya savane niyojento ‘‘iti attha’’nti osānagāthamāha.
tika-s0519t0:64_0: Vacanatthajānanena viditappakaraṇatthasāmaññatthassa pakaraṇakathā vuccamānā sobheyyāti nettipadatthaparijānanameva
tika-s0519t0:64_1: ādimhi yuttarūpanti tadatthaṁ pucchati ‘‘tattha kenaṭṭhena nettī’’ti.
tika-s0519t0:64_2: Tattha tatthāti ‘‘tassā nettiyā karissāmatthavaṇṇana’’nti yadidaṁ vuttaṁ, tasmiṁ;
tika-s0519t0:64_5: Tatthāti vā ‘‘nettippakaraṇassā’’ti etasmiṁ vacane yā netti vuttā,
tika-s0519t0:64_8: tāva nettisaddassa atthaṁ vatvā idāni karaṇādhikaraṇasādhanavasena vattuṁ ‘‘nayanti tāyā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-s0519t0:65_0: Tathā hi vuttanti nettiupadesādhīnattā eva suttāvabodhassa vuttaṁ.
tika-s0519t0:65_2: tattha pariyesanāya ayaṁ anupubbī bhavati soḷasa hārā pañca nayā aṭṭhārasa mūlapadānī’’tiādi (peṭako. 3).
tika-s0519t0:65_3: Hāranayavicāraṇā vinimutto atthasaṁvaṇṇanāviseso natthīti āha ‘‘suttassa atthasaṁvaṇṇanā nettiupadesāyattā’’ti.
tika-s0519t0:65_5: Evaṁ mahāvisayā cāyaṁ netti kuto pabhavāti āha ‘‘suttappabhavā’’ti,
tika-s0519t0:65_9: Thero hi pañca mahānikāye ogāhetvā taṁsannissayeneva tesaṁ saṁvaṇṇanābhūtaṁ imaṁ pakaraṇaṁ abhāsi,
tika-s0519t0:66_3: Tīṇi hi etāni pakaraṇāni tayo adhikārā,
tika-s0519t0:67_4: Puna ‘‘tathā hī’’tiādinā tamevatthaṁ pāḷiyā pākaṭataraṁ karoti.
tika-s0519t0:67_8: Tesu atthanayānaṁ aññamaññasaṅgaho parato āvi bhavissati.
tika-s0519t0:67_13: Puññābhisaṅkhāro ca apuññābhisaṅkhāro ca kāyadvārappavatto kāyasaṅkhāro,
tika-s0519t0:67_16: Iti jātivasena purimattike vuttā eva dhammā dvāravasena dutiyattike vuttā,
tika-s0519t0:67_17: te eva ca purimattiketi aññamaññasaṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-s0519t0:68_3: ‘‘Byañjanavidhiputhuttā’’ti idaṁ ekasmiṁ sutte anekesaṁ hārānaṁ sannipatanassa kāraṇavacanaṁ.
tika-s0519t0:69_0: ‘‘Na sarūpato’’ti iminā saṅgahavāre viya uddesaniddesavāresupi paṭṭhānassa atthato uddhaṭataṁ dasseti.
tika-s0519t0:69_1: Mūlapadaggahaṇeneva gahitattā uddesavāre tāva evaṁ hotu,
tika-s0519t0:69_4: Na hi mūlapadehi vinā kāci nayayojanā sambhavati.
tika-s0519t0:69_5: Apare pana ‘‘hāranayā viya paṭṭhānaṁ na suttassa saṁvaṇṇanāviseso,
tika-s0519t0:69_6: atha kho tasmiṁ tasmiṁ sutte saṁkilesabhāgiyatādilabbhamānavisesamattanti na tassa pakaraṇassa padatthasaṅgaho.
tika-s0519t0:69_7: Evañca katvā tettiṁsāya nettipadatthesu paṭṭhānaṁ asaṅgahitaṁ,
tika-s0519t0:70_2: tena therena bhāsitabhāvo viya bhagavatā anumoditabhāvopi pāḷianugato evāti dasseti.
tika-s0519t0:70_3: Sāvakabhāsitattā nidānaṁ na vuttanti na sakkā vattunti codento ‘‘sāvaka…pe…
tika-s0519t0:70_6: nidānavacanassa ca akāraṇaṁ ubhayatthāpi ubhayassa dassanato.
tika-s0519t0:70_7: Tasmā nidānāvacanena nettiyā asāvakabhāsitatā na sijjhatīti dasseti.
tika-s0519t0:71_1: teneva kāraṇena imassa pakaraṇassa pamāṇabhāvasiddhīti dasseti ‘‘nidānañca nāmā’’tiādinā.
tika-s0519t0:71_3: Ayañhettha payogo na nettiyā nidānaṁ vattabbaṁ pāḷiyā atthasaṁvaṇṇanābhāvato.
tika-s0519t0:71_4: Yā hi pāḷiyā atthasaṁvaṇṇanā na tassā nidānavacanaṁ diṭṭhaṁ yathā paṭisambhidāmaggassa,
tika-s0519t0:72_1: tāva yathādassitassa pakaraṇavibhāgassa puna ‘‘ādinā nayena pakaraṇavibhāgo veditabbo’’ti idaṁ nigamanaṁ.
tika-s0519t0:72_2: Tattha ādinā nayenāti ādisaddena abhiññeyyadhammaniddesato paññattipaññapetabbadhammavibhajanato tiyaddhapariyāpannadhammavicārato
